page.title: 10Changes at New Deer School
page.content: During the last year there have been a lot of{changes}at our school.The old secondary rooms for Home Economics, Metalwork and Science have been converted into Primary one and two and Playgroup rooms. The{Library, Music {room and T.V.rooms}have been changed around and one of the rooms is now an {Art room.}We have a new{Stage}at the end of the{Hall}and a new{Canteen}and {Kitchen}where the old rooms 1&2 used to be. The painters and plumbers have been in installing{new heating}and redecorating classrooms. A new{buspark}has been made so that we do not have to get off and on our buses in the street and the old canteen in the playground has been demolished.(Based on information from Primary Seven 1984/5).
